name: Haunted Mansion (itch) (SilverRaven)
description:
The abandoned mansion is posessed by a ghost. But no worries: it's planned to get blown up.
You are sent inside to retrieve an important ring from the mansion. The only problem is: the jewel is guarded by the ghost. Hurry up and get the ring out!

Happy Halloween!!

Thanks for playing!


Controls:
Move: AD
Jump: Space
Sprint: LeftShift
Drop Down: S
Flashlight: Click

You can check out my other games here.

Also: consider joining my Discord Server SilverRaven Games! :)
